title: Kingdom Hearts
description: The first game in the series.

title: Kingdom Hearts Chain of Memories
description: One half of the brigde between the end of Kingdom Hearts I and the beginning of Kingdom Hearts II.

title: Kingdom Hearts II
description: The second numbered game in the series. A fan favorite.

title: Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days
description: One half of the brigde between the end of Kingdom Hearts I and the beginning of Kingdom Hearts II.

title: Kingdom Hearts Re:Coded
description: Connects every game so far (as of 2011) together. Remake of the original, Japan-exclusive mobile game Kingdom Hearts Coded.

title: Kingdom Hearts Dream Drop Distance
description: Direct sequel to Re:Coded. Last main game until Kingdom Hearts III.

title: Kingdom Hearts Union χ
description: Takes place many centuries before Kingdom Hearts I. Delisted from all app stores in August 2024.

title: Kingdom Hearts χ Back Cover
description: Cinematic re-telling of the most important plot points in Kingdom Hearts Union χ. Included in the Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts 0.2 Birth by Sleep - A Fragmentary Passage
description: Takes place between Birth by Sleep and Kingdom Hearts I. Served as a tech demo for Kingdom Hearts III. Included in the Kingdom Hearts HD 2.8 Final Chapter Prologue Collection.

title: Kingdom Hearts III
description: Culmination of a story 17 years in the making (Not the end of that story).

title: Kingdom Hearts III Re Mind DLC
description: Additional content for Kingdom Hearts III.

title: Kingdom Hearts Dark Road
description: Prequel to Birth by Sleep and involves some themes established in Union χ. Was accessible from within Union χ.

title: Kingdom Hearts Melody of Memory
description: Serves as a re-telling of the story so far. Takes place after Kingdom Hearts III Re Mind DLC.

title: Kingdom Hearts IV
description: Still in development. Art shown is from the KH4 Reveal Event in 2022 and is not the box art.
